file_content.text: I am Ku-ki, fourteenth keeper of memories after Rukil.
We now number fifty-three adults and twenty-one children. We lost four able-bodieds and two child-bearers to the rakghoul virus this year.
Our records say there used to be a cure. We have lost so much....
Tomorrow, we leave to search for higher ground. Plants are growing; nature has reclaimed what once belonged to men.
Nature is cruel. Two of every three of our babies die to sickness and hunger. If we are to live, we must rebuild our walls.
[This doesn't seem like a natural rock formation. It looks like there is something buried here.]
